entry.tran: （尤指盗取他人计算机系统中保密信息的）黑客
entry.def: A computer hacker is someone who tries to break into computer systems, especially in order to get secret information.

entry.tran: 黑客（指沉迷于电脑之中，无暇顾及其他的电脑迷）
entry.def: A computer hacker is someone who uses a computer a lot, especially so much that they have no time to do anything else.

means.word_mean: 2. a programmer who breaks into computer systems in order to steal or change or destroy information as a form of cyber-terrorism
3. a programmer for whom computing is its own reward; may enjoy the challenge of breaking into other computers but does no harm;

sentences.sentence: "true hackers subscribe to a code of ethics and look down upon crackers"

means.word_mean: 4. one who works hard at boring tasks
